ApiDefinitionInfo.name: ApiDefinitionInfo
ApiDefinitionInfo.description: Information about the formal API definition for the web app.

url.name: url
url.description: The URL of the API definition.

AppServiceCertificate.name: AppServiceCertificate
AppServiceCertificate.description: Class representing the Key Vault container for certificate purchased through Azure

AppServiceEnvironment.name: AppServiceEnvironment
AppServiceEnvironment.description: Description of an hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

fileSystem.name: fileSystem
fileSystem.description: Application logs to file system configuration

azureTableStorage.name: azureTableStorage
azureTableStorage.description: Application logs to azure table storage configuration

azureBlobStorage.name: azureBlobStorage
azureBlobStorage.description: Application logs to blob storage configuration

ArmPlan.name: ArmPlan
ArmPlan.description: The plan object in an ARM, represents a marketplace plan

AutoHealActions.name: AutoHealActions
AutoHealActions.description:
AutoHealActions - Describes the actions which can be
            taken by the auto-heal module when a rule is triggered.

actionType.name: actionType
actionType.description: ActionType - predefined action to be taken

customAction.name: customAction
customAction.description: CustomAction - custom action to be taken

minProcessExecutionTime.name: minProcessExecutionTime
minProcessExecutionTime.description:
MinProcessExecutionTime - minimum time the process must execute
            before taking the action

AutoHealCustomAction.name: AutoHealCustomAction
AutoHealCustomAction.description:
AutoHealCustomAction - Describes the custom action to be executed
            when an auto heal rule is triggered.

AutoHealRules.name: AutoHealRules
AutoHealRules.description: AutoHealRules - describes the rules which can be defined for auto-heal

triggers.name: triggers
triggers.description: Triggers - Conditions that describe when to execute the auto-heal actions

actions.name: actions
actions.description: Actions - Actions to be executed when a rule is triggered

AutoHealTriggers.name: AutoHealTriggers
AutoHealTriggers.description: AutoHealTriggers - describes the triggers for auto-heal.

requests.name: requests
requests.description: Requests - Defines a rule based on total requests

privateBytesInKB.name: privateBytesInKB
privateBytesInKB.description: PrivateBytesInKB - Defines a rule based on private bytes

statusCodes.name: statusCodes
statusCodes.description: StatusCodes - Defines a rule based on status codes

slowRequests.name: slowRequests
slowRequests.description: SlowRequests - Defines a rule based on request execution time

AzureBlobStorageApplicationLogsConfig.name: AzureBlobStorageApplicationLogsConfig
AzureBlobStorageApplicationLogsConfig.description: Application logs azure blob storage configuration

sasUrl.name: sasUrl
sasUrl.description: SAS url to a azure blob container with read/write/list/delete permissions

retentionInDays.name: retentionInDays
retentionInDays.description:
Retention in days.
            Remove blobs older than X days.
            0 or lower means no retention.

AzureBlobStorageHttpLogsConfig.name: AzureBlobStorageHttpLogsConfig
AzureBlobStorageHttpLogsConfig.description: Http logs to azure blob storage configuration

sasUrl.name: sasUrl
sasUrl.description: SAS url to a azure blob container with read/write/list/delete permissions

retentionInDays.name: retentionInDays
retentionInDays.description:
Retention in days.
            Remove blobs older than X days.
            0 or lower means no retention.

AzureTableStorageApplicationLogsConfig.name: AzureTableStorageApplicationLogsConfig
AzureTableStorageApplicationLogsConfig.description: Application logs to azure table storage configuration

sasUrl.name: sasUrl
sasUrl.description: SAS url to an azure table with add/query/delete permissions

BackupSchedule.name: BackupSchedule
BackupSchedule.description: Description of a backup schedule. Describes how often should be the backup performed and what should be the retention policy.

frequencyInterval.name: frequencyInterval
frequencyInterval.description: How often should be the backup executed (e.g. for weekly backup, this should be set to 7 and FrequencyUnit should be set to Day)

frequencyUnit.name: frequencyUnit
frequencyUnit.description: How often should be the backup executed (e.g. for weekly backup, this should be set to Day and FrequencyInterval should be set to 7)

keepAtLeastOneBackup.name: keepAtLeastOneBackup
keepAtLeastOneBackup.description: True if the retention policy should always keep at least one backup in the storage account, regardless how old it is; false otherwise.

retentionPeriodInDays.name: retentionPeriodInDays
retentionPeriodInDays.description: After how many days backups should be deleted

startTime.name: startTime
startTime.description: When the schedule should start working

lastExecutionTime.name: lastExecutionTime
lastExecutionTime.description: The last time when this schedule was triggered

CloningInfo.name: CloningInfo
CloningInfo.description: Represents information needed for cloning operation

correlationId.name: correlationId
correlationId.description:
Correlation Id of cloning operation. This id ties multiple cloning operations
            together to use the same snapshot

cloneCustomHostNames.name: cloneCustomHostNames
cloneCustomHostNames.description: If true, clone custom hostnames from source web app

cloneSourceControl.name: cloneSourceControl
cloneSourceControl.description: Clone source control from source web app

sourceWebAppId.name: sourceWebAppId
sourceWebAppId.description:
ARM resource id of the source web app. Web app resource id is of the form 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName} for production slots and 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName}/slots/{slotName} for other slots

appSettingsOverrides.name: appSettingsOverrides
appSettingsOverrides.description:
Application settings overrides for cloned web app. If specified these settings will override the settings cloned 
            from source web app. If not specified, application settings from source web app are retained.

configureLoadBalancing.name: configureLoadBalancing
configureLoadBalancing.description: If specified configure load balancing for source and clone site

trafficManagerProfileId.name: trafficManagerProfileId
trafficManagerProfileId.description:
ARM resource id of the traffic manager profile to use if it exists. Traffic manager resource id is of the form 
            /subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/trafficManagerProfiles/{profileName}

trafficManagerProfileName.name: trafficManagerProfileName
trafficManagerProfileName.description: Name of traffic manager profile to create. This is only needed if traffic manager profile does not already exist

ConnStringValueTypePair.name: ConnStringValueTypePair
ConnStringValueTypePair.description: Database connection string value to type pair

Contact.name: Contact
Contact.description: Contact information for domain registration. If 'Domain Privacy' option is not selected then the contact information will be  be made publicly available through the Whois directories as per ICANN requirements.

CorsSettings.name: CorsSettings
CorsSettings.description: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings for the web app.

allowedOrigins.name: allowedOrigins
allowedOrigins.description:
Gets or sets the list of origins that should be allowed to make cross-origin
            calls (for example: http://example.com:12345). Use "*" to allow all.

unit.name: unit
unit.description: Units of measurement for the quota resourse

nextResetTime.name: nextResetTime
nextResetTime.description: Next reset time for the resource counter

currentValue.name: currentValue
currentValue.description: The current value of the resource counter

DatabaseBackupSetting.name: DatabaseBackupSetting
DatabaseBackupSetting.description:
Note: properties are serialized in JSON format and stored in DB. 
            if new properties are added they might not be in the previous data rows 
            so please handle nulls

connectionStringName.name: connectionStringName
connectionStringName.description:
Contains a connection string name that is linked to the SiteConfig.ConnectionStrings.
            This is used during restore with overwrite connection strings options.

connectionString.name: connectionString
connectionString.description: Contains a connection string to a database which is being backed up/restored. If the restore should happen to a new database, the database name inside is the new one.

DeletedSite.name: DeletedSite
DeletedSite.description: Reports deleted site including the timestamp of operation

Deployment.name: Deployment
Deployment.description: Represents user crendentials used for publishing activity

DomainPurchaseConsent.name: DomainPurchaseConsent
DomainPurchaseConsent.description: Domain purchase consent object representing acceptance of applicable legal agreements

agreementKeys.name: agreementKeys
agreementKeys.description: List of applicable legal agreement keys. This list can be retrieved using ListLegalAgreements Api under TopLevelDomain resource

agreedAt.name: agreedAt
agreedAt.description: Timestamp when the agreements were accepted

ErrorEntity.name: ErrorEntity
ErrorEntity.description: Body of the error response returned from the API.

Experiments.name: Experiments
Experiments.description: Class containing Routing in production experiments

FileSystemApplicationLogsConfig.name: FileSystemApplicationLogsConfig
FileSystemApplicationLogsConfig.description: Application logs to file system configuration

FileSystemHttpLogsConfig.name: FileSystemHttpLogsConfig
FileSystemHttpLogsConfig.description: Http logs to file system configuration

retentionInMb.name: retentionInMb
retentionInMb.description:
Maximum size in megabytes that http log files can use.
            When reached old log files will be removed to make space for new ones.
            Value can range between 25 and 100.

retentionInDays.name: retentionInDays
retentionInDays.description:
Retention in days.
            Remove files older than X days.
            0 or lower means no retention.

HandlerMapping.name: HandlerMapping
HandlerMapping.description:
The IIS handler mappings used to define which handler processes HTTP requests with certain extension. 
            For example it is used to configure php-cgi.exe process to handle all HTTP requests with *.php extension.

extension.name: extension
extension.description: Requests with this extension will be handled using the specified FastCGI application.

scriptProcessor.name: scriptProcessor
scriptProcessor.description: The absolute path to the FastCGI application.

arguments.name: arguments
arguments.description: Command-line arguments to be passed to the script processor.

HostName.name: HostName
HostName.description: Details of a hostname derived from a domain

siteNames.name: siteNames
siteNames.description: List of sites the hostname is assigned to. This list will have more than one site only if the hostname is pointing to a Traffic Manager

azureResourceName.name: azureResourceName
azureResourceName.description: Name of the Azure resource the hostname is assigned to. If it is assigned to a traffic manager then it will be the traffic manager name otherwise it will be the website name

azureResourceType.name: azureResourceType
azureResourceType.description: Type of the Azure resource the hostname is assigned to

HostNameSslState.name: HostNameSslState
HostNameSslState.description: Object that represents a SSL-enabled host name.

virtualIP.name: virtualIP
virtualIP.description: Virtual IP address assigned to the host name if IP based SSL is enabled

toUpdate.name: toUpdate
toUpdate.description: Set this flag to update existing host name

HostingEnvironmentProfile.name: HostingEnvironmentProfile
HostingEnvironmentProfile.description: Specification for a hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) to use for this resource

id.name: id
id.description: Resource id of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) (read only)

type.name: type
type.description: Resource type of the hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment) (read only)

fileSystem.name: fileSystem
fileSystem.description: Http logs to file system configuration

azureBlobStorage.name: azureBlobStorage
azureBlobStorage.description: Http logs to azure blob storage configuration

HybridConnection.name: HybridConnection
HybridConnection.description: Hybrid Connection contract. This is used to configure a Hybrid Connection.

IpSecurityRestriction.name: IpSecurityRestriction
IpSecurityRestriction.description: Represents an ip security restriction on a web app.

ipAddress.name: ipAddress
ipAddress.description: IP address the security restriction is valid for

subnetMask.name: subnetMask
subnetMask.description: Subnet mask for the range of IP addresses the restriction is valid for

LocalizableString.name: LocalizableString
LocalizableString.description: LocalizableString object containing the name and a localized value.

MetricAvailabilily.name: MetricAvailabilily
MetricAvailabilily.description: Class repesenting metrics availability and retention

MetricDefinition.name: MetricDefinition
MetricDefinition.description: Class repesenting metadata for the metrics

PerfMonResponse.name: PerfMonResponse
PerfMonResponse.description: Represents the perf monitor api reponse

code.name: code
code.description: Gets or sets the response code.

data.name: data
data.description: Gets or sets the perf mon counters.

PerfMonSample.name: PerfMonSample
PerfMonSample.description: Class representing a Perf Mon Sample

time.name: time
time.description: Point in time for which counter was measured

instanceName.name: instanceName
instanceName.description: Name of the server on which the measurement is made

value.name: value
value.description: Value of Counter at certain time

name.name: name
name.description: Unique key name of the counter

values.name: values
values.description: Collection of workers that are active during this time

PushSettings.name: PushSettings
PushSettings.description: Push settings for the Web App.

isPushEnabled.name: isPushEnabled
isPushEnabled.description: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the Push endpoint is enabled.

tagWhitelistJson.name: tagWhitelistJson
tagWhitelistJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that are whitelisted for use by the push registration endpoint.

tagsRequiringAuth.name: tagsRequiringAuth
tagsRequiringAuth.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that require user authentication to be used in the push registration endpoint.

dynamicTagsJson.name: dynamicTagsJson
dynamicTagsJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of dynamic tags that will be evaluated from user claims in the push registration endpoint.

RampUpRule.name: RampUpRule
RampUpRule.description: Routing rules for ramp up testing. This rule allows to redirect static traffic % to a slot or to gradually change routing % based on performance

actionHostName.name: actionHostName
actionHostName.description: Hostname of a slot to which the traffic will be redirected if decided to. E.g. mysite-stage.azurewebsites.net

reroutePercentage.name: reroutePercentage
reroutePercentage.description: Percentage of the traffic which will be redirected to {Microsoft.Web.Hosting.Administration.RampUpRule.ActionHostName}

changeStep.name: changeStep

changeIntervalInMinutes.name: changeIntervalInMinutes
changeIntervalInMinutes.description: [Optional] Specifies interval in mimuntes to reevaluate ReroutePercentage

minReroutePercentage.name: minReroutePercentage
minReroutePercentage.description: [Optional] Specifies lower boundary above which ReroutePercentage will stay.

maxReroutePercentage.name: maxReroutePercentage
maxReroutePercentage.description: [Optional] Specifies upper boundary below which ReroutePercentage will stay.

changeDecisionCallbackUrl.name: changeDecisionCallbackUrl
changeDecisionCallbackUrl.description:
Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which Url can be specified. See TiPCallback site extension for the scaffold and contracts.
            https://www.siteextensions.net/packages/TiPCallback/

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the routing rule. The recommended name would be to point to the slot which will receive the traffic in the experiment.

RelayServiceConnectionEntity.name: RelayServiceConnectionEntity
RelayServiceConnectionEntity.description: Class that represents a Biztalk Hybrid Connection

ResourceMetric.name: ResourceMetric
ResourceMetric.description: Object representing a metric for any resource

timeGrain.name: timeGrain
timeGrain.description: Metric granularity. E.g PT1H, PT5M, P1D

ResourceMetricName.name: ResourceMetricName
ResourceMetricName.description: Name of a metric for any resource

SiteLimits.name: SiteLimits
SiteLimits.description: Represents metric limits set on a web app.

maxMemoryInMb.name: maxMemoryInMb
maxMemoryInMb.description: Maximum allowed memory usage in MB

maxDiskSizeInMb.name: maxDiskSizeInMb
maxDiskSizeInMb.description: Maximum allowed disk size usage in MB

SkuCapacity.name: SkuCapacity
SkuCapacity.description: Description of the App Service Plan scale options

minimum.name: minimum
minimum.description: Minimum number of Workers for this App Service Plan SKU

maximum.name: maximum
maximum.description: Maximum number of Workers for this App Service Plan SKU

default.name: default
default.description: Default number of Workers for this App Service Plan SKU

scaleType.name: scaleType
scaleType.description: Available scale configurations for an App Service Plan

SkuDescription.name: SkuDescription
SkuDescription.description: Describes a sku for a scalable resource

tier.name: tier
tier.description: Service Tier of the resource sku

size.name: size
size.description: Size specifier of the resource sku

family.name: family
family.description: Family code of the resource sku

capacity.name: capacity
capacity.description: Current number of instances assigned to the resource

skuCapacity.name: skuCapacity
skuCapacity.description: Min, max, and default scale values of the sku

capabilities.name: capabilities
capabilities.description: Capabilities of the sku, eg., is traffic manager enabled?

resourceType.name: resourceType
resourceType.description: Resource type that this sku applies to

sku.name: sku
sku.description: Name and tier of the sku

capacity.name: capacity
capacity.description: Min, max, and default scale values of the sku

SlotDifference.name: SlotDifference
SlotDifference.description: An object describing the difference in setting values between two web app slots

Snapshot.name: Snapshot
Snapshot.description: A snapshot of a web app

SourceControl.name: SourceControl
SourceControl.description: Describes the Source Control OAuth Token

availableCapacity.name: availableCapacity
availableCapacity.description: Available capacity (# of machines, bytes of storage etc...)

totalCapacity.name: totalCapacity
totalCapacity.description: Total capacity (# of machines, bytes of storage etc...)

workerSizeId.name: workerSizeId
workerSizeId.description:
Size Id of machines: 
            0 - Small
            1 - Medium
            2 - Large

excludeFromCapacityAllocation.name: excludeFromCapacityAllocation
excludeFromCapacityAllocation.description:
If true it includes basic sites
            Basic sites are not used for capacity allocation.

isApplicableForAllComputeModes.name: isApplicableForAllComputeModes
isApplicableForAllComputeModes.description: Is capacity applicable for all sites?

TldLegalAgreement.name: TldLegalAgreement
TldLegalAgreement.description: Represents a legal agreement for top level domain

url.name: url
url.description: Url where a copy of the agreement details is hosted

nextLink.name: nextLink
nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources

includePrivacy.name: includePrivacy
includePrivacy.description: If true then the list of agreements will inclue agreements for domain privacy as well.

nextLink.name: nextLink
nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources

Usage.name: Usage
Usage.description: Class that represents usage of the quota resource.

serverFarmId.name: serverFarmId
serverFarmId.description: ARM resource id of an app service plan that would host the web app

skuName.name: skuName
skuName.description: Name of the target SKU for the server farm

capacity.name: capacity
capacity.description: Target capacity of the server farm (number of VM's)

hostingEnvironment.name: hostingEnvironment
hostingEnvironment.description: Name of app service environment where site or server farm should be created

ValidateResponseError.name: ValidateResponseError
ValidateResponseError.description: Error details for when validation fails

VirtualIPMapping.name: VirtualIPMapping
VirtualIPMapping.description: Class that represents a VIP mapping

VirtualNetworkProfile.name: VirtualNetworkProfile
VirtualNetworkProfile.description: Specification for using a virtual network

id.name: id
id.description: Resource id of the virtual network

type.name: type
type.description: Resource type of the virtual network (read-only)

VnetInfo.name: VnetInfo
VnetInfo.description: VNETInfo contract. This contract is public and is a stripped down version of VNETInfoInternal

VnetRoute.name: VnetRoute
VnetRoute.description: VnetRoute contract used to pass routing information for a vnet.

WorkerPool.name: WorkerPool
WorkerPool.description: Worker pool of a hostingEnvironment (App Service Environment)

methods.description: Lists all top level domains supported for registration
methods.displayName: Lists all top level domains supported for registration

methods.description: Gets details of a top level domain
methods.displayName: Gets details of a top level domain

name.name: name
name.description: Name of the top level domain

methods.description: Lists legal agreements that user needs to accept before purchasing domain
methods.displayName: Lists legal agreements that user needs to accept before purchasing domain
